name: Slynky in Moroder
overview: A platforming game created by Roberto Barondi and Published in New Special Playgames N°09 (Maggio 1988) supplement: Games Commodore 64 N°1. The protagonist of this story is Slynky the curious sneak thief found a map of a place near his house in which a golden statuette is buried. Armed with a pick-axe and a shovel he begins the search for the statuette knowing he must avoid the undead that haunt the place and all manner of underground hazards.
